Let me explain.
 
 Moore is a film maker. That's his job. He's not about putting THE truth out there for all to see, but putting HIS truth out there. When it suits him and his film he'll cut and paste anything in or out of sequence to make it melodramatic. Yes, the stupid things the Bush admin did is the truth and all the selfish tactics used are disgraceful, but that does not mean that F911 is about the whole truth - it's all about money ----- period.
